SLIDER_1: Natural resources are ending, energy efficiency is the way to a better world!

SLIDER_3: Start today & transmit energy efficiency, our planet will thank you
FMP_MODAL_FIRST_TEXT_HEADER: ¿Why electrical companies charge you for Power Factor ?
FMP_MODAL_FIRTS_TEXT_FIRST_LINE: Chilean law allows electricity distribution companies to charge each customer a surcharge of 1% on energy billing for each hundredth (0,01) in which the Power Factor (FP) of an installation is less than 0.93.
FMP_MODAL_FIRTS_TEXT_SECOND_LINE: That means that if the power factor of a splice is 0.86, the distributor will charge an 8% surcharge (0.93-0.85 = 0.08 = 8/100).
FMP_MODAL_FIRTS_TEXT_THIRD_LINE: ¿Why I generate a Power Factor Penalty?
FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_HEADER: ¿How to read the penalty for power factor?
FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_FIRST_LINE: For example, in the electricity bill of a school, where the active and reactive energy are recorded through two energy meters, the following charges appear:
FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_SECOND_LINE: The active energy consumption is 4238 kWh and the reactive power consumption is 3102 kVArh. Therefore, the monthly power factor is:
FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_THIRD_LINE: Then, the power factor surcharge that appears on the receipt is obtained from: 0,93-0,8069 = 0,1231 x 358466 = $ 44,127.-
FMP_MODAL_THIRD_TEXT_HEADER: ¿How can you get help to avoid paying this power factor penalty anymore?
FMP_MODAL_THIRD_TEXT_SECOND_LINE: In Energia Store, we conducted a STUDY OF POWER FACTOR AND IMPROVEMENT OF POWER FACTOR, OPTIMIZING THEIR ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION . We invite you to quote your project HERE or send us an email to info@energiastore.cl or phone: + 569-90786921
